# f5distributedcloud_namespace_role (Data Source)

Fetches information about an existing F5 Distributed Cloud Namespace Role.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the namespace role to look up.
- `namespace` (String) Namespace where the namespace role exists.

### Read-Only

- `description` (String) Description of the namespace role.
- `id` (String) Unique identifier of the namespace role.
